const url=new URL(loc.href);const trackingParams=['utm_source','utm_medium','utm_campaign','utm_content','utm_term','ref','gclid','fbclid','spa'];trackingParams.forEach(param=>url.searchParams.delete(param));// Create clean canonical URL - absolute URL matching current page exactly
